changes.description: Added new `content_checksum_enabled` parameter to `SigV4SigningProperties`. This will enable users to control the inclusion of the `X-Amz-Content-SHA256` header required by S3. This is disabled by _default_, so you will need to set this to `True` for any S3 requests.
Fixed incorrect exclusion of `X-Amz-Content-SHA256` header from some requests.
